kv14.3:1.3: Yā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva sotaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv14.3:2.1: ☑ Cakkhuviññāṇassa anantarā sotaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, na vattabbaṁ—
kv14.3:2.2: “yā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva sotaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv14.3:2.6: Nanu sotaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv14.3:2.8: Hañci sotaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:5.1: ☑ Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:5.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:6.1: ☑ Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:6.9: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
kv14.3:6.10: attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:8.5: Yā jivhāviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva kāyaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv14.3:8.7: jivhāviññāṇassa anantarā kāyaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, na vattabbaṁ—
kv14.3:8.8: “yā jivhāviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva kāyaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv14.3:8.12: nanu kāyaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv14.3:8.14: Hañci kāyaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:11.1: ☑ Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:11.3: Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:12.1: ☑ Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:12.9: Hañci “jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇan”ti—
kv14.3:12.10: attheva suttantoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:14.4: Nanu atthi koci naccati gāyati vādeti, rūpañca passati, saddañca suṇāti, gandhañca ghāyati, rasañca sāyati, phoṭṭhabbañca phusatīti?
kv14.3:14.6: Hañci atthi koci naccati gāyati vādeti, rūpañca passati, saddañca suṇāti, gandhañca ghāyati, rasañca sāyati, phoṭṭhabbañca phusati, tena vata re vattabbe—
